subject: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: addChild:  Child name 'ServletRedirector' is not unique
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve run a few cactus tests, but today I m getting  this Exception in  JBoss while deploying the war file.. java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: addChild:
messageBody:
Hi,
I've run a few cactus tests, but today I'm getting this Exception in JBoss
while deploying the war file..

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: addChild: Child name
'ServletRedirector' is not u
nique

I thought this error comes when we have the same servlet name multiple
times, but this error can be reproduced with this small web.xml
file which I have pasted below. Where have I gone wrong?

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<!DOCTYPE web-app
PUBLIC "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Web Application 2.3//EN"
"http://java.sun.com/dtd/web-app_2_3.dtd">

<web-app>

<servlet>
<servlet-name>ServletRedirector</servlet-name>

<servlet-class>org.apache.cactus.server.ServletTestRedirector</servlet-class
>
</servlet>


</web-app>
